I am having the same problem as helpfuld and ozi1989. A small gray rectangle appears on the center of a black screen just as the game is starting up and the clean disk error pops up. 

I have tried burning it three times, admittedly all with clonecd 5.3.0.1, twice on 2.4x and once on 1x all three onto 2.4x Verbatim (the same disks I have used many times before). All games previous to this have worked. 

Can anyone give me a hint what might be worth trying? It is definitely Wave 3 isn't it? Maybe trying a different burning program could work?

This is strange I've tried abgx360 on all three top Bayonetta torrents, they're all region free and seem to be working perfectly. the only drawback is that none of them can be stealth patched, abgx360 doesn't find them in the online database...so i don't know if i would recommend playing this on live or offline if you intend to plug your cable back in afterwards....I'm gonna wait a little myself and see if eventually it stealth patches.

i have the same problem at first "wipe the disc error" and blank screen, no success after 2 tries then i used the latest xbox backup creator it will set imgburn option automatically, now it's working great...
Can confirm this is 100% working. Around half way through the game, no problems for now.

Confirmed, works 100%, burned with imgburn at 2x speed, using verbatim 2.4x disc. Great rip, thanks AiTB!

FYI-  everyone having trouble burning these just use imgburn and select the DVD file when burning.  I have always used imgburn and haven't had 1 coaster yet (even when I'm running a million things in the background while burning).  Absolutely the best burning software out there IMO.
